section.h3: School Board Special Call Meeting and Budget Work Session

div.aria-label: Welcome to Charles City Public Schools

h2.span: Welcome to Charles City Public Schools

img.alt: SB Special Call and Budget Work Session
Tiger Packs will continue to be distributed each Friday.

p.a: Click here to visit our Distance Learning Resources Page.

img.style: color: #6e6e6e; display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;
img.title: download.jpg
img.alt: Make a Difference: volunteer Clip art

div.p: We want to thank you in advance for your interest in volunteering Charles City County Public Schools. The teachers, students and staff greatly appreciate the time you are willing to share through your volunteer work here. You will add greatly to the educational experience of our students.

Start by completing the volunteer application and submitting to our HR department. If you have any questions, please contact the School Board Office at (804) 652-4612. Click here for the Volunteer Application .
Click here for the Volunteer Coach Request Form .

div.p: Get real time district updates on your mobile device with eChalk Notify.
Connect with code IH1JJW to get instant alerts or log in with your eChalk user account for the latest updates from all your classes and groups.
